author: Alex Swoyer
title: Social distancing threatens social norms, mental health: 'It's hard to go back'...
description: The constant reminders that it's not safe to shake hands or come too close to one another isn't healthy, and mental health specialists warn that these social cues will linger in our minds after the COVID-19 pandemic ends.
content:
Going to a baseball game, packing into a concert arena or shaking another person’s hand could become a thing of the past if social distancing becomes a way of life.
The constant reminders that it’s not safe to shake hands or come too close to one another isn… [+3259 chars]
